title: ProofCard and BurnReceipt components
description:
Create proof-of-work card components matching the approved prototype at `playground/concept-b-proof.html`.

**Reference the prototype HTML/CSS carefully for all styling decisions.**

## Component 1: BurnReceipt

File: `src/frontend/src/components/features/burn-receipt.tsx`
Test: `src/frontend/src/components/features/burn-receipt.test.tsx`

The right-side panel on the hero proof card showing per-project burn data with a sparkline.

**Props:**
```typescript
interface BurnReceiptProps {
  weeklyData: number[]  // weekly aggregated values for sparkline
  duration: string  // e.g. "14 weeks"
  tokens: string  // e.g. "485K"
  peakWeek: string  // e.g. "52K"
}
```

**Design from prototype:**
- Background: `accent-subtle`, padding 24px, flex column, gap 16px
- Label: "BURN RECEIPT" in 10px uppercase, accent color, letter-spacing 0.05em
- Sparkline: canvas-based, 40px height, full width. Smooth bezier curve with gradient fill (accent color at 15% opacity fading to 5%). Line stroke: accent color, 1.5px width.
- Stats: 3 rows, each flex space-between. Label in 11px ink-tertiary. Value in 13px mono font-weight-500, accent color.
- Stats shown: Duration, Tokens, Peak week

## Component 2: ProofCard

File: `src/frontend/src/components/features/proof-card.tsx`
Test: `src/frontend/src/components/features/proof-card.test.tsx`

Two variants: `hero` (featured, full-width with burn receipt) and `compact` (smaller grid card).

**Props:**
```typescript
interface ProofCardProps {
  variant: 'hero' | 'compact'
  title: string
  description: string
  status: 'shipped' | 'in_progress'
  agentTools?: string[]  // only shown on hero variant
  builders?: { initials: string; name: string }[]
  tribeLabel?: string  // e.g. "via Buildspace Alumni"
  // Hero-only:
  receipt?: BurnReceiptProps
  // Compact-only:
  sparklineData?: number[]
  burnStat?: string  // e.g. "420K · 13 wks"
}
```

**Hero variant design:**
- `surface-elevated` background, 16px border-radius, shadow-sm, overflow hidden
- card-lift hover: translateY(-3px), shadow `0 12px 32px rgba(28, 25, 23, 0.10)`, transition 200ms cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1)
- Inner grid: 1fr 240px (content | receipt panel)
- Content area has dot texture: `radial-gradient(circle, rgba(28, 25, 23, 0.05) 1.2px, transparent 1.2px)` at 14px spacing
- Status badge: dot + uppercase text. Shipped = green, Building = amber (in-progress color)
- Title: serif font, 24px. Description: 14px ink-secondary.
- Agent tools: mono font tags, 11px, surface-secondary background, 4px border-radius
- Footer: builder avatars (24px circles, overlapping with -6px margin, outlined), builder count, tribe label in italic
- Right panel: BurnReceipt component

**Compact variant design:**
- `surface-elevated` background, 12px border-radius, 20px 24px padding, shadow-sm
- Same card-lift hover effect
- Status badge (smaller: 10px), serif title (18px), description (13px)
- NO agent tools shown
- Bottom: small sparkline (16px height) + burn stat text (10px mono)
- Optional tribe label below in 11px italic ink-tertiary

**Tests must cover:**
- BurnReceipt: renders label, stats, canvas element
- ProofCard hero: renders title, description, status, agent tools, builders, receipt panel, tribe label
- ProofCard compact: renders title, description, sparkline, burn stat, tribe label. Does NOT render agent tools.
- ProofCard handles missing optional props gracefully
acceptance_criteria:
- `src/frontend/src/components/features/burn-receipt.tsx` exists with sparkline canvas
- `src/frontend/src/components/features/proof-card.tsx` exists with hero and compact variants
- Hero variant has 2-column grid layout with receipt panel
- Hero content area has dot texture background
- Compact variant is a simple card with sparkline
- card-lift hover effect matches globals.css pattern exactly
- Agent tools only shown on hero variant
- Tests exist for both components
- `cd src/frontend && npx vitest run` passes
- `cd src/frontend && npx eslint .` passes
- `cd src/frontend && npx tsc --noEmit` passes
